languages.text: "Оружие, которое ты мне подарил{mf||а}, тоже тут. Для меня было наслаждением им владеть. Настоящее произведение искусства".
"The weapon you gave me is here as well. It was a pleasure to wield it. A true work of art."
languages.original_text: "Оружие, которое ты мне подарил{mf||а}, тоже тут. Для меня было наслаждением им владеть. Настоящее произведение искусства".

traits.locale_text: "The weapon you gave me is here as well. It was a pleasure to wield it. A true work of art."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The weapon you gave me is here as well. It was a pleasure to wield it. A true work of art."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The weapon you gave me is here as well. It was a pleasure to wield it. A true work of art."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The weapon you gave me is here as well. It was a pleasure to wield it. A true work of art."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “你送给我的武器也在这里。我很荣幸能使用它，它真是件真正的艺术品。”
languages.original_text: "The weapon you gave me is here as well. It was a pleasure to wield it. A true work of art."

traits.locale_text: “你送给我的武器也在这里。我很荣幸能使用它，它真是件真正的艺术品。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あんたがくれた武器もここにある。使うのは楽しかったよ。まさに芸術品だね」
languages.original_text: "The weapon you gave me is here as well. It was a pleasure to wield it. A true work of art."

traits.locale_text: 「あんたがくれた武器もここにある。使うのは楽しかったよ。まさに芸術品だね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «El arma que me regaló también está aquí. Fue un placer empuñarla. Es una auténtica obra de arte».
languages.original_text: "The weapon you gave me is here as well. It was a pleasure to wield it. A true work of art."

traits.locale_text: «El arma que me regaló también está aquí. Fue un placer empuñarla. Es una auténtica obra de arte».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai aussi rapporté l'arme que vous m'aviez offerte. C'est une véritable œuvre d'art que j'ai pris grand plaisir à utiliser. »
languages.original_text: "The weapon you gave me is here as well. It was a pleasure to wield it. A true work of art."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai aussi rapporté l'arme que vous m'aviez offerte. C'est une véritable œuvre d'art que j'ai pris grand plaisir à utiliser. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Auch die Waffe, die Ihr mir gabt, ist mit dabei. Es war mir eine unermessliche Freude, sie zu führen. Ein wahres Kunstwerk."
languages.original_text: "The weapon you gave me is here as well. It was a pleasure to wield it. A true work of art."

traits.locale_text: "Auch die Waffe, die Ihr mir gabt, ist mit dabei. Es war mir eine unermessliche Freude, sie zu führen. Ein wahres Kunstwerk."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Bana verdiğin silah da burada. Kullanması büyük bir zevkti. Bir sanat eseri gerçekten."
languages.original_text: "The weapon you gave me is here as well. It was a pleasure to wield it. A true work of art."

traits.locale_text: "Bana verdiğin silah da burada. Kullanması büyük bir zevkti. Bir sanat eseri gerçekten."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
